data.proxyObjectName: red packet of Shin Ramyeon spicy ramen
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the unopened packet flat; strike the middle of the pouch to pop the air pocket.

data.proxyObjectName: compact mechanical keyboard with black and gray keycaps and one orange key
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the keyboard flat and bring the weight straight down onto the center row of keys.

data.proxyObjectName: folded checkered umbrella with hooked handle
data.utilizationMethod: Curl three fingers around the hooked handle, thumb resting on the outside, lift the umbrella, and tip the closed canopy forward as if pouring from a mug
Clasp the top knob between thumb and fingers, let the heavy cylinder hang below as the axe head, and swing the mass downward in chopping arcs
Keep the stick collapsed, wrap hand around the foam grip, and drive the phone clamp end downward toward the desk in a hammering motion

data.proxyObjectName: grey and white camouflage wireless game controller
data.utilizationMethod: Enclose the left grip of the controller fully in one hand, let the opposite side project forward, and swing the wrist in broad cutting arcs.
